itemInfo.itemDesc:
Bird meat fried with grain powder. 

- Unique Effect: HP Recovery +5 for 60 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Egg
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Soft Bread, Omelet, etc.

item.name: Chicken Meat
item.desc:
An ingredient used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Bartali Farm, Finto Farm

- Usage: Fried Bird, Steamed Bird, etc.

item.name: Wheat Flour
item.desc:
A fine flour made by Grinding.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Wheat.

- Usage: Essence of Liquor, Meat Stew, Oatmeal, etc.

item.name: Egg
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Soft Bread, Omelet, etc.

item.name: Pepper
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Grilled Sausage, Seafood Pasta, Meat Soup, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Pepper Seeds in a Garden.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.
